title: Хід коня
overview: Maksym Nikonenko has everything: a favorite job, a lover, money. He is considered lucky and many envy him. But suddenly Nikonenko's life is destroyed - he finds himself in a colony for a murder he did not commit. While in the cell, Max scrolls through every second of his past to find the answer to the main question - who framed him and why. However, fate prepares a new twist for him and a new mystery - the "unknown savior" made a lot of efforts to free Max. Nikonenko is trying to understand who the savior is and most importantly - what is his motive.
